reviewText: I loved the Donny & Marie show in the 70's and enjoyed watching highlights again. Always a D & M fan!
I am the #1 fan of the Osmond family & I was so excited to get it. It was perfect!
My grandchildren loved this. A couple of generations gone by and still a great way to entertain all age groups. No one can resist sitting down to watch
The VHS of The Best of Donny and Marie volume 2 is a fun collection of skits, musical numbers and commentary by Donny and Marie.
It is a lot of commentary, which I didn't expect.  I thought I was going to watch an entire show of Donny and Marie.  The delivery time was excellent!
It was fun to see Donny and Marie and remember the funny things they did on their show.  It was also nice to hear their voices, as they blended so well together when they sang.

This VHS is just the BEST.! Highly recommended in everyway. The quality of the videos are excellent and the footage is so funny and entertaining, it was great for the whole family to sit down and be able to watch a classic television show that is fully family oriented.

Marie is just adorable in the show and the skits she and Donny do together are a little corny but oh so funny. Especially when they get the giggles themselves and stuff up a line. Its just good clean wholesome entertainment.... something that is very rare to find on television these days.

I would recommend getting both volumes as they are both fantastic veiwing. Our sides are still hurting from laughing so much. lol.

My only complaint about the two Donny & Marie Best of VHS...?? Once you've seen them you want to see MORE..!!

Please....please.....PLEASE......BRING OUT THE WHOLE SERIES OF THE DONNY & MARIE SHOW
